description: Give us the badge details of the Blue Badge holder on whose behalf you are applying.

texts: {"template":"intro","texts":["Give us the badge details of the Blue Badge holder on whose behalf you are applying."],"link":{"image":{}},"image":{},"wrapped":false}
To be eligible for this discount the disabled badge must have been issued in the United Kingdom or European Economic Area (EEA). Tell us where the badge was issued.
For Blue Badges issued in the United Kingdom, look on the front (the side without the photograph) for all the details you need.
The issuing authority is the borough or council where the Blue Badge holder lives - find this in the 'issued by' box. We may contact the issuing authority to confirm that the badge details are valid.
If the badge was issued outside the United Kingdom, enter the country it was issued in.
